org.cougaar.util.log
Interface LoggerController

All Known Subinterfaces:
LoggingControlService
All Known Implementing Classes:
LoggerControllerProxy
public interface LoggerController

A controller for a single Logger, used to set the logging levels and output destinations (console, files, etc).

This API is a bit kludgy -- it needs to be refactored into a more "readable" API, including a refactoring of LogTarget. For now I'm more concerned with the Logger API, since it will be used by all developers, than this LoggerController API.

Parameters:

getLogTargets

LogTarget[] getLogTargets()
Get an array of all LogTargets for this logger. return an array of LogTarget representing all the various logging destinations.

addLogTarget

void addLogTarget(int outputType,
                  java.lang.Object outputDevice)
Add a logging destination.

Parameters:
outputType - The LogTarget constant (CONSOLE, FILE, or STREAM).
outputDevice - The device associated with the particular output type being added. Null for Console, filename for FILE, the actual output stream object for STREAM.

addConsole

void addConsole()
Add a console output type to this logger.

This is equivalent to:

   addLogTarget(LogTarget.CONSOLE, null);

removeLogTarget

boolean removeLogTarget(int outputType,
                        java.lang.Object outputDevice)
Remove a logging output type.

Parameters:
outputType - The LogTarget constant (CONSOLE, FILE, or STREAM) of logging output to be removed. See constants above.
outputDevice - The device associated with the particular output type being removed. Null for Console, filename for FILE, the actual output stream object for STREAM.

removeLogTarget

boolean removeLogTarget(int outputType,
                        java.lang.String deviceString)
Remove a logging output type. This method is usually used in conjunction with getLogTargets() to iterate through list to remove items.

Parameters:
outputType - The LogTarget constant (CONSOLE, FILE, or STREAM) of logging output to be removed. See constants above.
deviceString - - The device associated with the particular output type being removed. Null for Console, filename for FILE, the String identifier name associated with the output stream.
